name: Sanguinary
description:
Gore/Horror warning

Enjoy a new year's party with your friends! Among the group, there's Annabeth, the snippy one of the group who keeps everyone on their toes! Next is Kiyanna, your closest friend, and lastly, Elijah... who seems to be out of place.

Make your way through the party with them and decide how the night ends up!

Pick through the choices to get three different endings!!
